Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Colfax
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Yates, 76th, Coles & 79th, due to police activity near 79th/Colfax

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Yates, 76th, Coles, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to police activity near 79th/Colfax

Allow extra travel time.
